data.title: Press – The Prospect Hotel
data.text:
2024 MICHELIN GUIDE

The MICHELIN Guide announces top honors for U.S. hotels in 2024

ARCHITECTURAL DIGEST

"Behind the door of this Regency townhouse in the Whitley Heights neighborhood hides the most confidential address from Los Angeles, a hillside treasure hotel designed by Martyn Lawrence Bullard."

HOLLYWOOD REPORTER

"For now, Rudolph’s focused on finding opportunities to perform live where she can, making us laugh, hiding in plain sight behind her divas. She was photographed May 24 at the Prospect Hotel in Hollywood."

SANTA BARBARA MAGAZINE

"Few properties shimmer with the kind of effortless old Hollywood glamor that the 24-room Prospect Hollywood possesses."

CONDE NAST TRAVELER

"Sipping Champagne while soaking in your room's clawfoot tub, you’ll definitely feel that old school Hollywood magic."

ARCHITECTURAL DIGEST

"The lobby is opulent in malachite, harlequin marble and gilded palm trees, while the guest rooms named for starlets and leading men feature leopard, zebra and ornate wallpapers."

EVENING STANDARD

"Decadence is the vibe at this delightful homage to old school Hollywood glamour."

TOWN & COUNTRY

"Though the exterior is unassuming, the interiors deliver high-key glam care of famed interior designer Martyn Lawrence Bullard"

GLAMOUR

"If you’re looking for classic old-school Hollywood style look no further than The Prospect Hollywood."

BILLBOARD

"Saweetie photographed by Shelby Goldstein on Jan. 11 at The Prospect Hollywood in Los Angeles."

ARCHITECTURAL DIGEST

"24 unique rooms & suites, deploying signature splashes of color and pattern while taking cues from the neighborhood's Tinseltown past."

RED ONLINE

"Decadent enough to meet any starlet’s spec, the Prospect Hollywood is a somehow-elegant mix of leopard-print, bold colours and full-size brass palm trees."

ARCHITECTURAL DIGEST FRANCE

"In Los Angeles, Martyn Lawrence Bullard designed the Prospect Hollywood Grand Premier Suite, where the claw-foot tub dialogues with Candice Held's wallpaper."

CONDE NAST TRAVELER

"A power anthem to color, pattern and texture...a proper slice of old Hollywood"

ELLE DECOR

"City of Stars: Los Angeles’ new breed of boutique hotels have polish and personality in spades"

ELLE DECOR

“Martyn Lawrence Bullard Brings Hollywood Regency to The Prospect Hollywood”

LALA MAGAZINE

"The Martyn Lawrence Bullard-designed, bespoke property features a charming lobby, lounge and central courtyard garden"

WWD

"Lawrence has restored it with his exotica style, lots of black-and-white tile, Moroccan-inspired archways and palm flourishes."

VOGUE LIVING

"L.A.’s newest boutique hotel combines opulence and modernity in equal measure."

NEW YORK TIMES

"Five new standout hotels in Los Angeles."

ANGELENO

"Carefully restored into a design haven in the center of town."

DEPARTURES

"The Prospect Hollywood is Los Angeles' Best New Hotel."

VOGUE

"Old-world glamour abounds at The Prospect Hollywood."
